string.value: A mysterious potion created through Alchemy. Increases HP by 2000 for 2 hours. Basically a character cannot use more than 1 potion at a time, but for Alchemists, they can use max 2 at a time.

string.value: Special buff for married couple only. Weapon Attack + 15, Magic Attack +15, Avoidability +15, Accuracy +15, last for 1 hr.

string.name: desc
string.value: Special buff for married couple only. Weapon Attack + 20, Magic Attack +20, Avoidability +20, Accuracy +20, last for 1 hr.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chest with a guardian dragon carved on it. According to legend, this belonged to an ancient dragon master.\nDouble-click to acquire the dragon master's treasures.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's the absolute truth, but it really hurts. It might be better to not know the truth, for what you don't know can't hurt you. Provides WEAPON ATT +10 and MAGIC ATT +8 in your enraged state, but you suffer -50 MP for mental trauma.

string.name: desc
string.value: What you don't know can't hurt you. If the truth is too much to handle, avoiding it may be wise. It provides Critical +10 in your consideration for others, but you suffer -80 HP because of the anxiety that comes after telling a lie.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ancient glacial water collected from the Ice Cliff in El Nath. It never freezes no matter how cold it gets and has the ability to restore the health of Hoblins.\nRestores Shammos's health.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cUsed in Ad Balloon Hunts.#\n\nIncreases Attack Speed and Movement Speed for you and your party for 10 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cUsed in Ad Balloon Hunts.#\n\nDecreases Attack Speed and Movement Speed for the opposing party for 10 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cUsed in Ad Balloon Hunts.#\n\nSets a time bomb on the hunting field. Affected opponents will be stunned for 3 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increase Weapon ATT +20 and Magic ATT +30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Inc Attack & Weapon Def +140, Jump +10, Accuracy +30, Speed +10, Avoidability +30, HP&MP + 100 for 5 mins

string.name: desc
string.value: Every character in the map receives Weapon Defense +250 and Magic Defense +250 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a star from the Milky Way that can be used to trade with a gift.

string.name: desc
string.value: ATT +15, M. ATT +15, Movement Speed +15, Jump +15 for 1 hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Lucky Gift: Drop Rate Increase Coupon

string.name: desc
string.value: Lucky Gift given by the Administrator. Increases Drop Rate 2X for 1 hour.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A carbonated drink made by Surl. Perfect for a hot day! Recovers 1000 HP and 1000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: An acorn that can be obtained from the Fruit Trees in Edelstein. Recovers 70 HP and 70 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses the power of the Buff Zone to increase Weapon ATT +30 and Magic ATT +30 for 30 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box given to the ones who have defeated Ani as a reward. If you open the box, you could obtain rare treasures.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a legendary Secret Remedy. \nIt fully recovers HP and MP, but if your maximum HP and MP exceed 99, 999, then 99,999 HP and MP will be restored.

A long, thin, baked rice cake. Tasty!
#cDuration: 30 min#
#cWeapon ATT +10#
#cMagic ATT +10#

You can feel the high expectations that Dr. Kim has for those who have great potential.

#cDuration: 30 min#

string.name: desc
string.value: All the cool kids use hair wax. You...do want to be cool, don't you?

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #can equipment item that has been upgraded#.
The higher number of successes, the better chance of applying advanced options.
If failed, the item is destroyed.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 100%
2 successes: 90%
3 successes: 80%
4 successes: 70%
5 successes: 60%
6 successes: 50%
7 successes: 40%
8 successes: 30%
9 successes: 20%
10 or more successes: 10%

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #can equipment item that has been upgraded#.
The higher number of successes, the better chance of applying advanced options.
If failed, the item is destroyed.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 80%
2 successes: 70%
3 successes: 60%
4 successes: 50%
5 successes: 40%
6 successes: 30%
7 successes: 20%
8 or more successes: 10% 
9 or more successes: below 5%.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #cupgradedequipment#.
More successes increase the chance of a good enhancement.
The item is destroyed upon failure.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 100%
2 successes: 90%
3 successes: 80%
4 successes: 70%
5 successes: 60%
6 successes: 50%
7 successes: 40%
8 successes: 30%
9 successes: 20%
10+ successes: 10%

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a golden bell that summons monsters. You can ring the bell by #cdouble-clicking# it to summon marvelous monsters. This cannot be used \nnear portals, in villages, where no monster appears, on Teleport and maps that forbid summoning.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shining marble where the Fluorescent Ghost hides. You can summon the Florescent Ghost by #cdouble-clicking#. You cannot use it near \nVillages or portals.

string.name: desc
string.value: Small pets love them. Recovers 30 Fullness. NOT for human!

string.name: desc
string.value: A high-quality dry treat that the Pigmies love. Pets love them, too.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on the item to send a New Year's card to a character of your choice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used on suspected botters. Usable only when a suspect is hunting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Orange Mushroom. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Orange Mushroom. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Grey. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Grey. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: This potion, given to you by Moira, transforms you into a dragon for a while.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Blue Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Blue Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion that can transform you into Tigun the guard.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special shell that you can get from Mano. It is said that it makes wishes come true...

string.name: desc
string.value: Your body feels lighter, and in no time, you will be floating in the air. Oh no! You’re a ghost!

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet shaped like a ghost, and it is not known what it is made out of. It is said that it has special abilities.

string.name: desc
string.value: A doll that was thrown away by Sophelia a long time ago, but the masked gentleman found and revived it. If you stroke its head, you can turn into Sophelia for 3 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The minute you drink this, you will turn into a superhuman.

string.name: desc
string.value: The minute you drink this, you will turn into a superhuman.

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into a small, cute mouse.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily transforming as a dragon, even with the skill set of an aging Halfring (Corba). The transformatino includes an ability to fly.

string.name: desc
string.value: The more you look at it, the more you feel lightheaded… and you feel closer to the moon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet, delicious rice cake. Sometimes creates an interesting set of powers.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment you drink this potion, you'll become the biggest star in the world of Maple, Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A transformation potion from the masked gentleman that allows you to transform into Peto for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: No one knows what you'll transform into when you drink this, but something WILL happen for one hour. It's all about the risk...

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on this to transform a character of your choice. Which one? Try it and find out!

string.name: desc
string.value: Popular lunar new year item, loved by everyone. It has a secret magic power that will give you a surprise.

string.name: desc

string.value: Engagement Ring made of silver. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores tamed monster's fatigue level by 30.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pheremone perfume created by Kenta. Use it to tame a Wild Pig at Korean Folk Town.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pouch decorated with gems. Its special ability will catch ghosts that are hovering around when you double click it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A specialized tool in alchemy that changes into a gem when it absorbs the strength of a monster. The inside looks kind of transparent.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cliff's magic cane. Can be used to tame a Lost Rudolph.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a special magic marble that can contain and purify a monster.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special, magical marble that can absorb a poisoned monster on the 1st floor and trap it inside the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special, magical marble that can absorb a poisoned monster on the 2nd floor and trap it inside the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special, magical marble that can absorb a poisoned monster on the 3rd floor and trap it inside the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fish net intended to catch something. Can be used with Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A green ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A purple ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Hodori.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Hogul.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Growlie.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Tiger.

string.name: desc
string.value: A net that Robinson gave you. You can use it to catch fishes in Aqua Road.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small ball that can be used to capture aliens.

string.name: desc
string.value: A net used for catching a Serpent that has been weakened. Double-click on it to catch a weakend Serpent.

string.name: desc
string.value: A strong cage made of metal. Double-click on it to catch Eleanor's pet after it has been weakened.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rope used for catching a weakened Ribbon Pig. Double-click on it to catch the pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass bottle that contains an actual lava, which is waiting to be spilled out. Drink this lava, and the lava will consume the body with fire, which will enable the drinker to master Fire Demon.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Fresh from the fertile earth back in Maple Island! The fishes simply love these baits!

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the EXP and Meso earned by fishing by 1.5 times! Don't try to eat it just because it is too delicious!

string.name: name
string.value: Traditional Fishing Bait For Fishing Assistant Use Only

string.name: desc
string.value: Magical Fishing Bait that can only be used by Fishing Assistant. Limited purchase of Traditional Fishing Bait on daily basis. All Fishing Baits must be utilized fully before next purchase.

string.name: name
string.value: Surpreme Fishing Bait For Fishing Assistant Use Only

string.name: desc
string.value: Supreme Fishing Bait which is the favourite for all fishes, this special bait is able to increase the yield of your catch.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cThe Owl of Minerva#, which represents wisdom, can be used to search for items sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears right after showing the results of the item search#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world. This item cannot be used to teleport in between continents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble that Helena gave to you. Use it, and you'll be connected to Helena instantly, no matter how far you are apart. This is only available for one-time use only.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons Tommy the traveling merchant. #cDouble-click# to trade with Tommy.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it one copy at a time, and a mysterious aura will surround your body and bless you. Collect 20 of these to read the contents of the book.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it one copy at a time, and a mysterious aura will surround your body and bless you. Collect 20 of these to read the contents of the book.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it one copy at a time, and a mysterious aura will surround your body and bless you. Collect 20 of these to read the contents of the book.

string.name: desc
string.value: The pop quiz will be based on Knights of Cygnus, it may bring more than just good luck to those that answer the questions correctly. Click on the book to start the quiz.

string.name: desc
string.value: Resets the Gold Key Room in Richie Gold's Maze.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to check your current position, along with the spot of the Gold Key Room.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of paper featuring a myriad of illegible scribbles.\n#cDouble-click on it to start the quest.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A compass that does not have anything marked on it. Gather up the #cletters N,E,W, and S for the compass#, however, and this may transform into a useful compass afterall.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gold compass that will guide one to the Treasure Island in Gold Richie. \n#cDouble-click the item# to be transported to the Treasure Island.

string.name: desc
string.value: A perfume that contains the scent of a young explorer. \n#cDouble-click on it# to spray it and fool the monster in the process.

string.name: desc
string.value: An artifact with an unknown date of origin.\n#cDouble-click# on it to find out its date of origin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A freezing-cold ice bar that allows one to tranform into Peng Peng. There's no way to control what kind of Peng Peng you'll transform into.

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful chemical extracted from Poison Mushroom. It has the ability to remove the barrier in the forest.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magic powder that eliminates the spine from the vine.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is an ice box full of things to blow your heat away. If you don't open it before the event period ends, then its contents will all melt away.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box whose contents are unknown, though a Yellow Butterfly might just be hidden inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: What is in of the box? Could it be a yellow butterfly? Nothing will come out of the box if you're over level 71.

string.name: desc
string.value: What is in of the box? Could it be a yellow butterfly? Nothing will come out of the box if you're over level 101.

string.name: desc
string.value: What is in of the box? Could it be a yellow butterfly?

string.name: desc
string.value: A gold compass that indicates the location for Richie Gold's Treasure Island.\n#cDouble-click# to be transported to the island.

string.name: desc
string.value: A polaroid that takes pictures of the moon. Stand near the full moon near town, then double-click the polaroid to snap a shot. If failed, you can obtain another one through Baby Moon Bunny.

string.name: desc
string.value: A black pouch from Ibech, a member of Black Wings. Apparently all I need to do is open it in front of the Safe...

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift box that Cliff has prepared for the children of Maple World. Double-click to find out what's inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: An item that can be used to reset during an emergency.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you're really curious about how it tastes, muster up your courage and take a sip.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use the coupon to learn how to mount on Balrog. The number of days effective will be determined by your luck.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A tail feather from Cassandra's owl. Instead of returning it to Cassandra, keep it and use it after November 10th, 2010 to witness miraculous powers.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Chicken] mount skill for 30 days starting today

string.name: desc
string.value: A fragment from Miracle Cube. Double-click it to use the item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pass obtained by defeating a monster. You must have the pass to move onto the next stage.

string.name: desc
string.value: A soccer ball celebrating the Taeguk Warriors. Gather 20 and then double-click on them to receive a gift or EXP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Lion] mount skill for a year.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Red Truck] mount skill for a year.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Gargoyle] mount skill for a year.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Unicorn] mount skill for a year starting today

string.name: desc
string.value: A time bomb. Double-click on it and it will explode after a certain amount of time has passed.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can enter the prize event by double-clicking on the sticker. Only Dual Blades can win a lucky AS/Real Life item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special Energy Capsule for Resistance members. It can only be used by Resistance members Level 30 or above, and may be used up to 7 times. A large amount of EXP will be gained when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special Energy Capsule. Starting on August 12th, it can be used by anyone Level 30 or above, and may be used up to 7 times (Including the number of times the Resistance Energy Capsule is used). A large amount of EXP will be gained when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box that contains secret weapons for the Resistance. It is locked with a secret password. It can only be opened by #cResistance members#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box that contains supplies prepared by Cassandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret box, with something hidden inside. It's locked with a password. It doesn't seem like it can just be opened by anyone though...

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the [OS4 Shuttle] riding skill for 15 days starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the Mount skill [Owl] for 30 days, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the Mount skill [Owl] for 1 year, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box that contains supplies prepared by Cassandra. It is said to contain important items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter sent to you by an anonymous admirer. You can feel how much love was put into it...maybe you should open it...

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it, and it will change into a Skill Mastery Book. However, you won't know what Skill Mastery Book it will become until you use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the Mount skill [Mothership] for 30 days, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the Mount skill [Mothership] for 1 year, starting from today.

string.value: Double-click to use the Mount skill [OS3A Machine] for 30 days, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the Mount skill [OS3A Machine] for 1 year, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the [Leonardo the Lion] riding skill for 30 days, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pouch created by combining cloths of five different colors.#cDouble-click to see what is inside.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A medal containing special powers of the Lion King. Although it's gray at the moment, it can be purified into a Noble Lion King Medal with 50 Purification Totems, or into a Royal Lion King Medal with 100 Purification Totems.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal containing Alcaster's magic. Use it to lift the Lion King's curse from the villagers.

string.value: Double-click to use the Strawberry Icecream Bar for 15 Day, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: A totem that blocks Riche's magic. #cDouble-click# it to place it when you are in the vicinity of Riche.

string.name: desc
string.value: A zippy-looking coupon. Double-click on it to use the Blue Scooter riding skill for 60 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: A 2011 Boom up event item.. It's a gift set given to users who created a new character.

string.name: desc
string.value: A 2011 Boom up event item. It's a gift set given to players who reach Lv. 30 with a newly-made character.

string.value: A 2011 Boom up event item. It's a gift set given to users who reach Lv. 50 with a newly-made character.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Santa Sled riding skill for 12 hours.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stone imbued with the power of thunder. Double-click on it to create a Dream Key by combining a Dawn Stone, Blaze Stone, Wind Stone, and Night Stone.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the Mount skill [Giant Bunny] for 60 days, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: A 2010 Winter event item. It's a gift set given to users who created a new character.

string.name: desc
string.value: Box with a special Chaos gift inside. #cDouble-click# it to see what's inside!

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Race Kart riding skill for 7 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Race Kart riding skill for 30 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: Are you tired? Try the new fresh, minty energy drink, Red Moo! Restores 5 Fatigue. You can drink 3 energy drinks per day.

string.name: desc
string.value: Are you tired? Feel better with a refreshing orange Vita-C! Restores 10 Fatigue. You can drink 3 energy drinks per day.

string.name: desc
string.value: Are you tired? Shrug it off with hyper-caffeinated Mobstar energy drink! #cRestores 30 Fatigue#. Warning: May cause insomnia.\n#cUnlimited use.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Box containing a snowdrop gift. #cDouble-click# to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: Box containing a snowdrop gift. #cDouble-click# to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: Box containing a snowdrop gift. #cDouble-click# to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: A legendary elixir of power. Take a sip to gain a level.\n#cMaximum-level characters cannot benefit from this item.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Are you tired? Try this new drink--a mixture of Red Moo and Vita-C! Super Moo! Restores 30 Fatigue.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pouch available for purchase with a Gallant Emblem. No one knows what's inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Balrog riding skill for 10 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift to commemorate the introduction of Chaos. What could be inside?

string.name: desc
string.value: Are you tired? Try the only energy drink with the refined essence of bear, Bear Power! Restores 50 Fatigue.

string.name: desc

string.value: A legendary elixir of power. Take a sip to gain a level.\n#cMaximum-level characters cannot benefit from this item.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Mineral Water laced with sweet carrot syrup. Restores 40 Fatigue. You can drink 3 energy drinks per day.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Power Suit riding skill for 10 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: This rock seems like a perfect hiding place for a frog. It's too heavy to carry more than 10.\n#cDouble-click to check for frogs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a cute Orange Imp in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your imp by feeding it gear that's similar to your level. It will reward you when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a cute Gemstone Imp in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your imp by feeding it gear that's similar to your level. It will reward you when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a cute Fortune Moon Bunny in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your imp by feeding it gear that's similar to your level. It will reward you when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Placing this in your item pot will put the creature on the left of the pot to sleep for 3 more days.

string.name: desc
string.value: Placing this in your item pot will put the creature on the right of the pot to sleep for 3 more days.

string.name: desc
string.value: Placing this in your item pot will awaken the creature on the left of the pot after 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Placing this in your item pot will awaken the creature on the right of the pot after 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: This rice ball will feed the creature on the left side of your item pot for the next 12 meals.

string.name: desc
string.value: This rice ball will feed the creature on the right side of your item pot for the next 12 meals.

string.name: desc
string.value: Put this item in your item pot to increase the creature on the left's likability by 10.

string.name: desc
string.value: Put this item in your item pot to increase the creature on the right's likability by 10.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lucky Gift given by the Administrator. Increases EXP 2X for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: Multiplies your EXP by 3 for 60 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Admin's apologies for the events of January 1st. Use it to receive EXP x2 for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Weekend benefit for people who have played more than 3 times from Monday through Friday. Can only be used until midnight.
#cDouble-click# to activate the buff.
#cDuration: 1 Hour
Effect: EXP x2

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious magnifying glass that can appraise the potential that is hidden in an equipment item.\n#cIt can appraise items that are Lv. 30 and below.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious magnifying glass that can appraise sealed Potential on equipment.\n#cCan appraise all items.#

string.name: desc
string.value: It provides you one additional chance to apply a scroll on your equipment item. The Golden Hammer can only be use on the item that are not been upgraded by any Vicious Hammer. Only 1 Golden Hammer can be used on each item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A hammer that provides you one additional chance to apply a scroll to your equipment item at a 50% chance. The Golden Hammer can only be use on the item that are not been upgraded by any Vicious Hammer. Only 1 Golden Hammer can be used on each item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be purchased with OSSS's Medals. Increases the number of times that Bing Machine-Alpha and Visitor Equipment can be upgraded.

string.name: desc
string.value: Extends the Visitor Suit's duration by 1 week. Can be synthesized using a few Crystanol Molecules.

string.name: desc
string.value: Extends the Visitor Suit's duration by 1 month. Can be synthesized using an adequate amount of Crystanol Molecules.

string.name: desc
string.value: Extends the Visitor Suit's duration by 100 days. Can be synthesized using many Crystanol Molecules.

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently activates the Visitor Suit. Can be synthesized using Crystanol Molecules.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip armors that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Cap, shoulder accessory, clothes, pants, outfit, mantle, gloves, belt, shoes#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip weapons that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. Can only be used on equipment.\n#c Available slots: Weapon, shield, secondary weapon#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip accessories that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Pendant, ring, eye accessory, face, earrings, pocket#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip ETC equipment that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Medal, badge, dragon, Mechanic equipment#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip armors that are #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Cap, shoulder accessory, tops, bottoms, outfits, capes, gloves, belt, shoes#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into the Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip weapons that are for #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. Unable to use on the items that cannot be equipped/removed.\n#c Available slots: Weapon, shield, secondary weapon#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into the Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip accessories that are for #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Pendant, ring, eye accessory, face accessory, earrings, pocket#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into the Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip ETC equipments that are #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Medal, badge, dragon, Mechanic equipment#

string.name: desc
string.value: Rat Mouth packed this lunchbox for me. Eating it will increase ATTack, Defense, Jump, and Speed by 5.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click in the vicinity of Lara Rong to catch Lara Rong. But, not the new one... is it?

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click in the vicinity of Kaka Rong to catch Kaka Rong. But, not the new one... is it?

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a travel ticket I received along with the very first vacation. #cDouble-clicking# will transport you to Gold Beach.

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing a hat whose level is higher than 100. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial Armor#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: name
string.value: Sealed Box (Body armor, upper garment, lower garment)

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing an armor whose level is higher than 100. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial Armor#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing shoes or gloves that are of levels higher than 100. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial Armor#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing weapons that are of levels higher than 100. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial weapon#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing a hat whose level is higher than 100. Open it very carefully. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial Armor# or #cspecial recipe#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: name
string.value: Chaos Sealed box (Body armor, upper garment, lower garment)

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing an armor whose level is higher than 100. Open it very carefully. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial Armor# or #cspecial recipe#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing shoes or gloves that are of levels higher than 100. Open it very carefully. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial Armor# or #cspecial recipe#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing weapons whose level is higher than 100. Open it very carefully. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial weapons# or #cspecial recipe#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: desc
string.value: This potion can only be obtained via Sealed Box. It contains the power of Radiance Moonfall Potion of Root Abyss Garden. Drinking this will increase Physical Attack by 20, Magic Attack by 20, HP by 2,000, MP by 2,000, and Defense by 200 for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a very worn out Old Village Summoning Scroll. It looks as though it might rip to pieces any moment.

string.name: desc
string.value: This just looks too suspicious. They say there's minerals inside, but…

string.name: desc
string.value: This just looks too suspicious. They say there's herbs inside, but…

string.name: desc
string.value: This amazing coupon will repair equipment anytime, anywhere upon use!

string.name: desc
string.value: This potion can only be obtained via Sealed Box. It contains the mysterious Moonfall power of Root Abyss Garden. Drinking it will instantly wind back time for you, randomly going to Lv. 1~10. \n Note: This can only be used #conce# throughout your entire life. #cTake caution.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is an Invincible Potion for the Operator's smooth taking of the test. Using it will make you invincible for 10 minutes. #cThis can only be used for local tests.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a Miracle Cube that resets the equipment item's Potential abilities but for some reason I sense dark force from it. People say that there is a chance that the level may #cgo down#... Could that be true? \n#cThis can only be used for items between Lv. Rare to Lv. Unique# \n#cHighest Level of Result: Unique#

string.name: desc
string.value: Designates the ability to use 'Final Strike' skill on Armors. \nFinal Strike: Additional 150% damage during strike

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll can only be used on Valentine Bracelet. It enhances the ATT of Valentine Bracelet.

string.name: desc
string.value: This item can only be used at a specific area to summon the evil fake emperor. This item cannot be use in other areas.

string.name: desc
string.value: 보합의 레벨을 1레벨 올려준다. 성공확률 100%, 10레벨 이상의 보합에만 사용할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 2x Point Coupon for #cAncient Artifact Contest#. When you double-click it, you can receive a ticket that allows you get points doubled #cfor 3 hours#.

string.name: desc
string.value: 2x Point Coupon for #cAncient Artifact Contest#. When you double-click it, you can receive a ticket that allows you get points doubled for #ca day#.

string.name: desc
string.value: 2x Point Coupon for #cAncient Artifact Contest#. When you double-click it, you can receive a ticket that allows you get points doubled #cfor 7 days#.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you are lucky enough, you may obtain a powerful scroll from the reward box!

string.name: desc
string.value: You got the Dragon Gift Box, right? Click it to see what's inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fresh milk squeezed out of a reindeer. Tastier than it sounds.\nRecovers 5000 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Dew collected in the early morning. Recovers 4000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ripe, red, tasty apple.\nRecovers around 30 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet, tasty orange.\nRecovers around 50 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A very sour fruit.\nRecovers around 150 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Magic ATT.\nMagic ATT+5 for 30 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion found inside a Mysterious Artifact fragment. Its age is unknown, but it's surely safe to drink. Increases HP by 1000 for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion found inside a Mysterious Artifact fragment. Its age is unknown, but it's surely safe to drink. Increases MP by 1000 for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion found inside a Mysterious Artifact fragment. Its age is unknown, but it's surely safe to drink. Increases all stats, Speed and Jump by 10 for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion found inside a Mysterious Artifact. Increases Magic ATT by 5 for 20 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion found inside a Mysterious Artifact. Increases ATT by 5 for 20 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cup full of spicy yet tasty rice cakes. Increases ATT by 8 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A wonderful snack that tastes like a combination of soda pop and chicken nuggets. Increases Magic ATT by 8 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Exactly 10 inches of delicious frozen goodness. Increases Speed by 15 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tasty squid basted with butter, then roasted over an open flame. Increases Avoidability by 400 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sweet cotton candy that looks as soft as the clouds in the sky. Increases Accuracy by 400 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A puffy snack made with rice. Nice and crunchy! Increases Weapon Defense by 400 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A balloon full of helium gas. Makes you feel much lighter when you hold it, like you could float away... Increases Jump by 10 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box full of all kinds of yummy food. Increases ATT by 10, Magic ATT by 10, Speed by 15, and Jump by 10 for 15 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gaga's watermelons are ripe with power! Increases ATT/Magic ATT by 20, Weapon/Magic DEF by 200, and HP by 500 for 1 hour. Can be stacked with other buffs, aside from watermelon buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gaga's watermelons are bursting with power! Increases ATT/Magic ATT by 30, Weapon/Magic DEF by 300, and HP by 1000 for 1 hour. Can be stacked with other buffs, aside from watermelon buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gaga's watermelons contain unimaginable power! Increases ATT/Magic ATT by 40, Weapon/Magic DEF by 400, and HP by 1500 for 1 hour. Can be stacked with other buffs, aside from watermelon buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Kenta wants to help, so he'll share his lunch with you! Increases ATT by 30, Weapon/Magic DEF by 500, Speed by 10, and Jump by 10 for 3 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fruity sundae that will keep you cool in the summer heat.\nRestores 1500 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Forget regular hair wax. All the cool kids use PREMIUM hair wax now.

string.name: desc
string.value: For premium eyes, premium carrot juice is where it's at. The taste is also premium, of course.

string.name: desc
string.value: This soup, made by boiling snake bones for 2 days straight, will grant you amazing, snake-like powers. At least, that's what they say.

string.name: desc
string.value: Are your hands extra filthy? Of course they are. That's why hand sanitizer comes in extra-strength now. Because of you.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's pretty much like coffee, but makes you feel fancy when you drink it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A strong, sweet scent to cover your natural aroma of sweat and monster bits.

string.name: desc
string.value: If the character who has purchased the Basic Value Pack purchases this, then the current experience points bonus and ATT/Magic Attack buff effect can be upgraded. You can also purchase for the remaining days of your Basic Value Pack, and it can be purchased and used in units of 1 day. Effects other than experience point bonus and ATT/Magic Attack buff are not applied. The currently applied upgrade information can be viewed through the Value Pack UI.#

string.name: desc
string.value: It's not... It wasn't me! Someone's stink is seeping in from somewhere. Those who smell this will have their maximum HP increase by 10% for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: What is this? Such refreshing scent of flowers.... It's so lovely it can hypnotize you. Those who smell this will have 10% of their maximum MP increase for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Driven by the strong desire for fashion, ATT and Magic Attack increases by 30 for 2 hours. This can be used with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A tasty watermelon obtained from the Tasty Watermelon Pot. Better enjoy it before it goes bad!
#cDouble-click on it to obtain
an Alarm Clock (Right) and one of the following buffs:
-Lv. 30 or below-
ATT/M. ATT +20
Weapon/Magic DEF+200
HP+500
-Lv. 31-70-
ATT/M. ATT +30
Weapon/Magic DEF +300
HP +1000
-Lv. 71 or higher-
ATT/M. ATT +40
Weapon/Magic DEF +400
HP +1500
Buffs can be stacked with other buffs, aside from additional watermelon buffs.#

string.name: name
string.value: Mimir's Well Water for Cannon Shooters

string.name: desc
string.value: Mimir's Well Water, prepared especially for Cannon Shooters. You can't consume more than 100 of them and you can only consume them until July 17th.\n#cWhen consumed by a Cannon Shooter, EXP will increase by 10% before level 50. From level 50 to 99, EXP will increase by 5%. It can't be consumed at level 100 or higher.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Cultivate a 8th Anniversary Potted Mini Maple Tree in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your Potted Mini Maple Tree by feeding it gear that's close to your level. It will reward you with a Golden Maple Fruit when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a Tasty Watermelon Pot in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your Tasty Watermelon Pot by feeding it gear that's close to your level. It will reward you with Gaga's Tasty Watermelon when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a Tasty Watermelon Pot in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking this item after you have obtained Gaga's Tasty Watermelon from the First Tasty Watermelon Pot#.\nGrow your Tasty Watermelon Pot by feeding it gear that's close to your level. It will reward you with Gaga's Tasty Watermelon when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Improves or decreases the effectiveness of King Pepe weapons.\nSuccess Rate: 100%

string.name: desc
string.value: Adjusts the equipment's current option for better or worse. It cannot be used on cash items. Some options are not affected.

string.name: desc
string.value: Adjusts the equipment's current option similarly to the Chaos Scroll. Some options are not affected.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #cupgraded equipment#.
More successes increase the chance of a good enhancement.
The item is destroyed upon failure.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 100%
2 successes: 90%
3 successes: 80%
4 successes: 70%
5 successes: 60%
6 successes: 50%
7 successes: 40%
8 successes: 30%
9 successes: 20%
10 successes: 10%
11+ successes: 5% or lower

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #cupgraded equipment#.
More successes increase the chance of a good enhancement.
The item is destroyed upon failure.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 80%
2 successes: 70%
3 successes: 60%
4 successes: 50%
5 successes: 40%
6 successes: 30%
7 successes: 20%
8 successes: 10%
9+ successes: 5% or lower

string.name: autodesc
string.value:
#cSuccess Rate: 50%
Chance to destroy item on failure: 50%
Enhances equipment with no remaining upgrades by 5 additional ranks.
#

string.name: desc
string.value: Enhances the #cequipment item whose upgrade has been completed#. The higher the enhancement, the more likely of applying advanced options.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains enough EXP to take a character from level 1 to level 30. If you level up after using it and there's still EXP left in the item, you can use it again. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: A 30-day Orange Mushroom mount coupon.#cDouble-click on it to use the Orange Mushroom riding skill for 30 days.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box you can open to get a Legends Maple Weapon. This can be used until 2012/03/03.\n#cDouble click to open the box.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box dropped by the Golden Dream Pig. It might contain something you've been dreaming of!\n#cDouble-click# on it to see what's inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: Infused with the energy of the Legendary Maple Tree.

string.name: desc
string.value: Special Mimir's Well Water for all classes. You can drink it only until 2012/03/03. during the event period. Drinking this water will give you 10% EXP if you're Lv. 50 and below, 5% EXP if you're Lv. 50 - Lv. 99, 2% if you're Lv. 100 - Lv. 149, and 1% if you are Lv. 150 or higher.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box that contains exciting Legends memories, as well as one gift. You can open this box until midnight 2012/03/07.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fruit obtained from growing and harvesting from the Legends Maple Coin Tree. You can use the fruit only until 2012/03/03. Double-click to see what's inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Moon Festival Gift Box from defeating Moon Bunny. You can only open this box during the Moon Festival.\n#cDouble-click# on it to see what's inside.

string.value: A gift set given to new users. It's cute!

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.value: A Miwok Boy rescued from the Disappearing Jungle.

string.name: desc
string.value: This treasure sack is...not very impressive. #cDouble-click# on it to see what's inside. Make sure to open it by 05/09/12!

string.name: desc
string.value: What a shiny treasure sack! #cDouble-click# on it to see what's inside. Make sure to open it by 05/09/12!

string.name: desc
string.value: The glint of gold from this treasure sack sets your heart to pounding. #cDouble-click# on it to see what's inside. Make sure to open it by 05/09/12!

string.value: Diamonds?! Where did they find DIAMONDS?! #cDouble-click# on it to see what's inside. Make sure to open it by 05/09/12!

string.name: desc
string.value: A taming coupon which grants you use of Snow White. Wild Hunters riding Snow White get #c120 Speed, 120 Jump, and 50% Power Stance effect.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A coupon that allows you to use the Small Rabbit mount for 30 days.\n#cDouble-click# on it to use the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Infused with the powers of sunshine and joy. It bestows a blessing of substantial EXP,\n#cunless your character is already max level.#

string.name: desc
string.value: With additional patience, the Essence of Patience shines brighter than ever.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box given to the ones who have defeated Ani as a reward. Open the box to obtain various scrolls. However, those who are Lv. 140 or higher cannot obtain scrolls.

string.name: desc
string.value: A training guide from Luden, the Lion King's loyal knight. Grants the user a Mastery Book to enhance their skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: A vessel of purified light. Its power should be enough to destroy the magic barriers that Arkarium placed around the Dimensional Schism.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystallized embodiment of Sunday magic for the Tempest festival. Use it to gain a considerable chunk of EXP.\n#cMax level characters will reap no benefits.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A 30-day Knight Chariot mount coupon.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to use the Knight Chariot riding skill for 30 days.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to plant a Maple Coin Tree in your Item Pot. A Legends Maple Coin Tree consumes loot items or equipments obtained from the monsters that are in the same level range with you, and you will get a Golden Maple Fruit from the tree once it's fully grown. However, you can't receive anything from the tree after the event ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a cute Rainbow Fortune Moon Bunny in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nDouble-click on the item you obtained from the Fortune Moon Bunny to complete the Rainbow Sunday mission.

string.value: Using it on an item whose level is lower than Epic will provide a Unique Level Potential on the item. Afterwards, the sealed Potential can be viewed with a magnifying glass.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious potion made to celebrate year of the black dragon. Turn into a black dragon for 30 minutes on use.

string.name: desc
string.value: This copies the appearance of a monster, enabling you to take on the form of a Golem for a while.

string.name: desc
string.value: You will transform into Henesys's Orange Mushroom.

string.name: desc
string.value: You will transform into Henesys's Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: When the mysterious power of the Crystal Statue seeps into your body, you will transform into Alien Grey.

string.name: desc
string.value: An EXP elixir that Gaston created. Will it really get you to Lv. 70 in one-go?

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains enough EXP to take a character from level 1 to level 30. If you level up after using it and there's still EXP left in the item, you can use it again. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains enough EXP to take a character from level 30 to level 70. If you level up after using it and there's still EXP left in the item, you can use it again. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Experience points needed for growth from Lv. 1 through Lv. 30 are accumulated. You can use them by #cdouble-clicking#. If they are in greater amount than the current level-up Exp, then they can be divided and used. \n#cOnly Canon Shooters are allowed to be used.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Experience points needed for growth from Lv. 1 through Lv. 30 are accumulated. You can use them by #cdouble-clicking#. If they are in greater amount than the current level-up Exp, then they can be divided and used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift from Andy the Neo City Time Traveler. Contains a Mastery Book for your character.

string.name: desc
string.value: The empty sock that you put in the Item Pot filled up with Christmas gifts! #cDouble-click# to receive a random gift. Careful, this can only be opened until TKTKTK when Christmas event ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shining gift box prepared by Jingling Santa. #cDouble-click# to obtain an awesome gift. Careful, this can only be opened until TKTKTK when Christmas event ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# on it to use the #Santa Sled# riding skill for #c7 days#, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: The book is enchanted to become whatever the reader needs most. Double-click to transform it into one Special Mastery Book of choice.\n#cCannot be used by Cygnus Knights, can be used by Mihile#

string.name: desc
string.value: A shining gift box prepared by Rudolph. #cDouble-click# to obtain an awesome gift. Careful, this can only be opened until 31.01.2013.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift box to celebreate Christmas 2011.\n#cDouble-click on it to see what's inside.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A faintly nice smelling envelope given to you by Cassandra. The paper looks very lush.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box for people who make their own justice.\n#cDouble-click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box for people who make their own justice.\n#cDouble-click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box for people who make their own justice.\n#cDouble-click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: With blessings of the Knights of Virtue, you gain more power. Depending on your level, this increases your ATT and Magic ATT, HP and Mana, or Movement Speed.

string.name: name
string.value: Year of the Dragon New Year's Luck Sack

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious luck sack that's filled with new year's luck. Double-click on it to see what's inside. Careful, this can only be opened until TKTKTK when event ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: A legendary elixir of great power. Double-click to use.\n#cMaximum-level characters cannot benefit from this item.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A coupon that allows you to use the #c[Yeti]# mount for #c30 days#.\n#cDouble-click# on it to use the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coupon that allows you to use the #c[Pink Scooter]# mount for #c30 days#.\n#cDouble-click# on it to use the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small crystal filled with Santa's blessing. Use it to obtain a considerable amount of EXP.\n#cHowever, max level characters will reap no benefits.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Special tickets that allow you into Gold Richie's Treasure Vault, where the richest man in Maple World stores his stuff!\nDouble-click on the ticket to visit Gold Richie's Treasure Vault.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ticket that grants you one additional entry to the Zakum Dungeon. You will also receive a scroll to move to the Entrance to Zakum's Altar. You can enter the dungeon up to 5 additional times each day.

string.name: name
string.value: Lion King Dungeon Additional Entry Ticket

string.name: desc
string.value: Ticket that grants you one additional entry to the Lion King Dungeon. You can enter the dungeon up to 5 additional times each day.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ticket that grants you one additional entry to the Horntail Dungeon. You will also receive a scroll to move to the Entrance to Horntail's Cave. You can enter the dungeon up to 5 additional times each day.

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bean Dungeon Additional Entry Ticket

string.name: desc
string.value: Ticket that grants you one additional entry to the Pink Bean Dungeon. You can enter the dungeon up to 5 additional times each day.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ticket that grants you one additional entry to the Cygnus Dungeon. You can enter the dungeon up to 5 additional times each day.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box for people who make their own justice.\n#cDouble-click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box for people who make their own justice.\n#cDouble-click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box for people who make their own justice.\n#cDouble-click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Delicious new year's rice cake soup. ATT, M. ATT, HP & MP increased based on your level for 30 minutes. However, this will go bad after a day of obtaining it, so be careful!

string.name: desc
string.value: A colorful year year's gift box. Double-click on it to see what's inside. Careful, this can only be opened until TKTKTK when event ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yut used for New Year's game of Yut.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coupon that allows you to use the Fortune riding skill for 30 days. Only obtainable during New Year's.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box for people who make their own justice.\n#cDouble-click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box full of New Year's cheer! Double-click to see what's inside!

string.name: desc
string.value: A small crystal created to celebrate New Year's. Use it to obtain a considerable amount of EXP.\n#cHowever, max level characters will reap no benefits.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Mount skill [Cretaceous Mount] for 1 year.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Mount skill [Cretaceous Mount] for 15 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: Secret book for true Silent Crusaders. Double-click to obtain a Mastery Book for your character.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# on this to put Christmas Socks in the Item Pot and receive gifts. \nInsert items or equipment from monsters around your level into the Magic Christmas Socks. You'll receieve gift-filled socks after 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# to grow a Maple Tree Seedling in your Item Pot.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# to raise a fish for the Marine Museum in your Item Pot.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-clicking# this allows you to receive presents from Christmas stockings hanging on the Item pot. \nYou can place war booty or equipment items of monsters with similar levels as the owner to fall asleep. After 30 minutes of sleeping, you will be rewarded with a stocking full of presents.

string.name: desc
string.value: The by-product that mixed with some Nuwa's loess. Treasure box attributes will reconfigure when it is sprinkle on the treasure box. When chivalrous' level has reached 120 and the treasure box eight-trigram is showing Yang symbol, treasure box's level will randomly increases or reduces.

string.name: desc
string.value: The admixture that mixed with some Nuwa's loess. Treasure box attributes will reconfigure when it is sprinkle on the treasure box. It can adjust the treasure box attribute better than Nuwa's loess by-product. When chivalrous' level has reached 120 and the treasure box eight-trigram is showing Yang symbol, treasure box's level will randomly increases or reduces.

string.name: desc
string.value: The extraction than mixed with some Nuwa's loess. Sprinkle it on treasure box will set the treasure box attribute to the highest level. It can adjust the treasure box attribute better than Nuwa's loess by-product. When chivalrous' level has reached 120 and the treasure box eight-trigram is showing Yang symbol, treasure box's level will randomly increases or reduces.

string.name: desc
string.value: Leaf grows by Spring God After using it on treasure box, treasure box attributes will no longer automatically configure for 7 days. Can only use once to configure treasure box attributes. \r\n#c If player uses this item to reconfigure attributes again, the extended period will be cancelled, please pays attention about it. #

string.name: desc
string.value: Fragment that contains Nuwa's energy. Treasure box attribute will rotate clockwise for one slot.

string.name: desc
string.value: It contains other's dream. Can only be used once every 10minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The gift Yulia prepared for the person that will come to MapleSEA sooner or later.

string.name: desc
string.value: The special blessing Yulia prepared especially for chivalrous. For chivalrous, it will increases chivalrous level by one. For other classes, it will increase next level's experience by 30~50%. #c An item than can be moved within an account. #

string.name: desc
string.value:
Awesome coupon given to those that log into Maple World every day.

#cDouble-click to obtain the following effects:
Lv. 30 or lower
Weapon/Magic Attack: +20
Lv. 31 - 70
Weapon/Magic Attack: +30
Lv. 71 or higher
Weapon/Magic Attack: +40

 Stacks with other Non-Daily buffs.#

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A special capsule for the Resistance. Can be moved into storage and given to another character. The capsule will expire once the event has ended.\n#cSwallowing this capsule will give you 10% EXP if you're Lv. 50 and below, 5% EXP if you're Lv. 50 - Lv. 99, and 2% EXP if you're Lv. 100 - Lv. 149. Cannot be used if you're under Lv. 10 or if you're Lv. 150 or higher (Cygnus Lv. 120).#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is hot cocoa personally made by Casandra herself. Drinking it will provide you with a certain amount of experience points depending on your level. You can only drink it during the event period. It is 20% experience points for levels below \n#c50, 10% from Lv. 50 to Lv. 99, 2% from Lv. 100 to Lv. 149, and 1% for those above Lv. 150. Characters above Lv. 200 (Cygnus Lv. 120) and those with Xenon Jobs cannot use this, but all other characters can drink 3 per day.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
This is a legendary potion said to be made by the Forest Fairy. It feels like a mysterious item because it holds pieces of gold-colored stars that shine very brightly. If you use it and defeat the Root Abyss Seal Guardian, Physical Attack and Magic Attack will increase by 20% for 1 hour. 
#cNote#
You cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time. 
This is only effective within the Root Abyss area.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This is a legendary potion said to be made by the Forest Fairy. It feels like a mysterious item because it holds pieces of white-colored stars that shine very brightly. If you use it, your chance of obtaining Epic Items will skyrocket for 1 hour. 
#cNote#
You cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time. 
This is only effective within the Root Abyss area.

string.name: desc
string.value: Immersed in the Halloween party atmosphere, your ATT and Magic Attack increase by 10 for 30 minutes. Overlaps with buffs other than Happy Halloween Day.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This buff is filled with cheers for the post season. 
#cDuration: 30 minutes
Physical Attack +10
Magic Attack +10#

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this Wax will make you feel more charismatic. Let's give it a try.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drinking this Carrot Juice will make your eyes feel better and sharpen your vision. Let's drink it all in one gulp.

string.name: desc
string.value: Eating this Snake Stew will make you feel powerful and strong-willed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this Hand Sanitizer will make your hands feel cleaner and more dexterous in performing tasks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drinking this Cup of Coffee will make you feel sentimental and more sensitive.

string.name: desc
string.value: Trying his Perfume will make you feel more attractive.

string.name: desc

string.value: You can only get this red potion at Monster Park Extreme. ATT increases by 20 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: You can only get this red potion at Monster Park Extreme. Magic Attack increases by 20 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can only get this gold potion at Monster Park Extreme. Maximum HP and MP increase by 2,000, and experience points increase by 10% for 30 minutes.

#cDuration: 30 minutes
Physical Attack +15
Magic Attack +15#

string.value:
This is a lovely blessing given to the members of Club Henesys. Increases character's ATT and Magic Attack. It can be applied with other buffs. 
#cDuration: 1 hour
Physical Attack +30
Magic Attack +30#

string.name: desc
string.value:
This is a wonderful blessing, which celebrates autumn in Maple World. Increases character's A and magic power. It can be applied with other buffs. 
#cDuration: 1 hour
Physical Attack +20
Magic Attack +20#

string.name: desc
string.value: Item drop rate triples for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: This healthy dish is the signature menu of Gold Beach Restaurant. It enhances charisma, sensitivity, insight, willpower, hand skills, and attractiveness. \n#cYou can use it by doubling clicking it.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Good deeds beget even more good deeds. Increases ATT and Magic Attack. This can also be used with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: This spicy, sweet Ginger Man Cookie was made with Earl Grey tea. \nRecovers about 3,000 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: This spicy, sweet Ginger Lady Cookie was made with Earl Grey tea. \nRecovers about 3,000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grow Grow Mentee! HP and Maximum MP increases by 3,000 for 1 hour. This can be used with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: This mysterious buff was obtained at the PC Room's Monster Arena. It makes your body feel as light as a feather. Highly enhances moving speed and jumps for 20 minutes. This can also be used with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: This synergy machine can create a #cMystery Mastery Book 1# by fusing 2 regular Mastery Books. \nMystery Mastery Books that you obtained as a result of the fusion are #cuntradeable.# You cannot register or fuse Mystery Mastery Books.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This synergy machine can synthesize 2 regular recipes to create #cJewel Craft-only Scroll#. 

#cObtainable Item#
Jewel Craft's
 Chaos Scroll 60%

Jewel Craft's
Miraculous Chaos Scroll 40%

Jewel Craft's
Positive Chaos Scroll 30%

string.value:
#cRecipe sold by 100% Success Rate

string.name: desc
string.value: This synergy machine can synthesize 2 types of Jewel Craft gems to create a different kind of Jewel Craft gem. \nThrough synthesis, it can create Grade S or A jewels, but you can also get the same kinds of jewels.

string.name: desc
string.value: This synergy machine can synthesize 2 regular scrolls to create #cMysterious Scroll Book#. The result of synthesis, Mysterious Scroll Book, is a #cnon-exchangeable# item. Some items such as Mysterious Scroll Book type items cannot be registered nor synthesized.

string.name: desc
string.value: Secret Scroll for true Silent Crusaders. Double-click to obtain a Weapon Scroll for your character.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lucky bonus item that gets you additional points in the Mu Lung Dojo Hard Mode.

string.name: desc
string.value: Chocolate with a message of love engraved on the surface. Depending on your level, ATT, M. ATT, and Speed will increase when consumed. Unfortunately, it melts after one day.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely gift box to celebrate Valentine's Day. Double-click to see what's inside. Careful, this can only be opened until TKTKTK, when the event ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: Marble containing the sun's energy. Collect 10 and #cdouble-click# to create one Sunburst.

string.name: desc
string.value: Box containing a Valentine's Day gift. Double-click to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: Box containing a mysterious treasure. Double-click to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gift box given to newly reborn Dual Blades. Open to receive Pendant of the Spirit (30-Day), Dual Blade, Reborn medal, and a cash item called Owl Effect. However, be warned that the box will disappear if not used within one week.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sweet candy filled with love. Consume it to obtain EXP. Since it's TOO sweet, you can only eat up to 5 a day. Cannot be used once the event period is over.

string.name: desc
string.value: White Day gift box with a cute ribbon. Open it to receive your White Day gift! Cannot be used once the event period is over.

string.name: desc
string.value: Luxurious-looking box that contains a scroll. Cannot be used once the event period is over.

string.name: desc
string.value: Special cheer given to newly reborn Dual Blades. Increases Max HP/MP for 30 minutes. Higher the level, higher the amount increased, and can be stacked with other buffs. It does not disappear from the inventory after use. Can be used as much as desired during the event period at 30-minute intervals.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter sent to you by an anonymous admirer in lieu of White Day. You can feel how much love was put into it...maybe you should open it...

string.name: desc
string.value: Gift box given by #cMatilda#k, manager of Premium PC Cafe. Can only be received once a day. Not even Matilda knows what's inside. \n#cDouble-click# to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hilla's treasured pet, Dark Soul, sleeps within this box. #cDouble-click# to obtain [Pet] Dark Soul or Dark Soul's Earrings.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to teleport to the desired town, no matter the continent. Disappears 3 hours after the receipt. #cCan be used once every 30 minutes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Evil Spirit Box obtained after defeating Eregos. It feels like useful items will be inside. However, it must be opened by the midnight of 9/4/2012.\r\n#cDouble-click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Box from the 3!3!3! event.\n#cDouble-click to open.#\nMust be opened by 09/24/12.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gold box from the 3!3!3! event.\n#cDouble-click to open.#\nMust be opened by 09/24/12.

string.name: desc
string.value: Memo that has the Mustache Factory's phone number and the order number.

string.name: desc
string.value: A dusty old box from the back of Spielgelmann's Antiques Roadhouse. Valuable items await.\n#cDouble-click to open.#\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Who knows how much this thing could be worth...

string.name: desc
string.value: Magical dust dropped by the Rhinojinn. It's so magical that it just might give you a lot of Artifact Points at once!

string.name: desc
string.value: 7-day Balrog mount coupon. Double-click to to learn the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: 7-day Orange Mushroom mount coupon. Double-click to to learn the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: 7-day Yeti mount coupon. Double-click to to learn the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A sweet potion made from Maple Syrup. Your level will determine how much HP and MP are restored. Not affected by potion related skills or potentials.
#cBelow Lv. 30: HP/MP +100
Lv. 30 - 69: HP/MP +300
Lv. 70 - 99: HP/MP +1000
Lv. 100 - 119: HP/MP +2000
Lv. 120 - 149: HP/MP +3000
Lv. 150 or higher: HP/MP +4000

string.name: desc
string.value: The Cannoneers are back in business! Increases Weapon Attack, Speed, and Jump for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift from beyond the stars for returning Legends. Allows you to teleport to any town, no matter the continent. Due to its fragile cellular structure, it implodes 24 hours after being touched. #cCan be used once every 30 minutes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Eight wonderful years, all summed up on one little card. Double-click to obtain massive EXP boosts, depending on your level.\n#cHas no effect on max level characters. Can be used until TKTKTK, the end of the event.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box brimming with 8th Maple Birthday gifts. Double-click to open.

string.value: Merry Happy halloween! Attack and magic attack will be increased 30 each for 30mins. It will be overlapped with other buff excluding merry happy halloween

string.name: desc
string.value: 역시 설날에는 떡국 ! 30분 동안 체력과 마나가 200 씩 상승한다. 설날 떡국을 제외한 다른 버프와 중복 가능하다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 역시 설날에는 떡국 ! 30분 동안 체력과 마나가 600 씩 상승한다. 설날 떡국을 제외한 다른 버프와 중복 가능하다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 역시 설날에는 떡국 ! 30분 동안 체력과 마나가 1000 씩 상승한다. 설날 떡국을 제외한 다른 버프와 중복 가능하다.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A special buff for the ones who completed the Ocean Museum!! 
#cDuration 30minutes
Physical Attack +10
Magical Attack +10#

string.name: desc
string.value: A special buff for the ones who completed the Ocean Museum!! \n#cDuration 1 Hour\nDrop Rate x2

string.name: desc
string.value:
A special buff for the ones who completed Snack Museum!! 
#cDuration 30 mins
Physical Attack +20
Magical Attack +20#

string.name: desc
string.value: 메이플 3000일을 기념하며 준비한 선물 상자다. 다양한 아이템이 들어 있다.\n#c더블 클릭으로 내용물을 확인할 수 있다.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 카산드라가 건네준 괴도의 예고장 봉투이다. 고급스러운 재질로 만들어져 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 2013복복복 비츠 조각 A, B, C, D 중 1종이 들어있는 상자다. #c더블클릭#해서 내용물을 확인할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 2013복복복 비츠 조각 E, F, G, H 중 1종이 들어있는 상자다. #c더블클릭#해서 내용물을 확인할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 2013복복복 비츠 조각 I, J, K, L 중 1종이 들어있는 상자다. #c더블클릭#해서 내용물을 확인할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 2013복복복 비츠 조각 중 1종이 들어있는 상자다. #c더블클릭#해서 내용물을 확인할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 스페셜 비츠 3종을 포함한 2013복복복 비츠 조각 15개 중 1종이 들어있는 상자다. #c더블클릭#해서 내용물을 확인할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 도전목표 달성자들에게 주어지는 상자. 무엇이 들어있을까?

string.name: desc
string.value: 확인되지 않은 10주년 주문서다. #c더블클릭#하면 어떤 주문서인지 확인할 수 있다.\n#c2013년 5월22일까지 사용가능.

string.name: desc
string.value: 10주년 화이트 무기가 들어있는 상자다. #c더블클릭#하면 어떤 무기인지 확인할 수 있다.\n#c2013년 5월22일까지 사용가능.

string.name: desc
string.value: 10주년 화이트 방어구가 들어있는 상자다. #c더블클릭#하면 어떤 장비인지 확인할 수 있다.\n#c2013년 5월22일까지 사용가능.

string.name: desc
string.value: 10주년 비츠가 들어있는 상자다. #c더블클릭#하면 어떤 비츠조각인지 확인할 수 있다.\n#c2013년 5월22일까지 사용가능.

string.name: desc
string.value: 10주년 블랙 방어구가 들어있는 상자다. #c더블클릭#하면 어떤 장비인지 확인할 수 있다.\n#c2013년 5월22일까지 사용가능.

string.name: desc
string.value: 10주년 프라임-비츠가 들어있는 상자다. #c더블클릭#하면 어떤 비츠조각인지 확인할 수 있다.\n#c2013년 5월22일까지 사용가능.

string.name: desc
string.value:
장비강화 주문서의 효과가 업그레이드된 놀라운 장비강화 주문서이다. 장비 아이템의 #c업그레이드가 끝나지 않았을 때도 주문서를 사용#할 수 있으며, #c강화에 따른 옵션 상승 수치가 강화#되었다. 단, 슈페리얼 장비 아이템에는 사용할 수 없다. 
강화 실패 시 아이템 파괴

#c[강화 성공확률]#
1성 : 60%
2성 : 55%
3성 : 50%
4성 : 40%
5성 : 30%
6성 : 20%
7성 : 19%
8성 : 18%
9성 : 17%
10성 : 16%
11성 : 14%
12성 : 12%
13성 이상 : 10%

string.name: desc
string.value:
장비강화 주문서의 효과가 업그레이드된 놀라운 장비강화 주문서이다. 장비 아이템의 #c업그레이드가 끝나지 않았을 때도 주문서를 사용#할 수 있으며, #c강화에 따른 옵션 상승 수치가 강화#되었다. 단, 슈페리얼 장비 아이템에는 사용할 수 없다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 마법의 할로윈 나무가 자라는 맵으로만 이동할 수 있는 순간 이동의 돌이다. 사용 횟수에 제한은 없으나 이벤트 기간 내에만 사용할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 가면신사의 가방이다. 열어보기 전까진 어떤 것이 들어 있을지 알 수 없다. \n#c2011년 11월 17일#까지 사용 가능.

string.name: desc
string.value: if you #c double click # then you can use and learn for #c7days# on riding skill #c witch's broomstick #.

string.name: desc
string.value: it’s a halloween magic candy that can cause invincible power when you eat it. Xp will be increased base on your level. But, you can take only 10 in a day, and you cant have it anymore when halloween event is over

string.name: desc
string.value: Master's coupon made to commemorate halloween. One of your specialty will be in next level when you use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: 운영자님이 선물해 주신 몬스터 라이프 선물 교환권이다. #c 더블 클릭# 하여 사용하면, 내 몬스터 라이프에 농장 이름 변경권이 지급된다.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c더블클릭#하면 #c놀라운 장비강화 주문서#가 3개 지급되는 꾸러미이다. 단, #c2013년 3월 4일# 이후에는 아이템을 사용할 수 없다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 대장간의 신 헤파이스토스에 도전하여 13성 강화를 달성한 자에게 주어지는 아주 특별한 선물 상자다. 더블 클릭하면 150 레벨 제한의 타일런트 장비 아이템 중 하나를 획득할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 먹으면 경험치가 올라가는 신비한 떡국이다. 하루에 최대 10개까지 먹을 수 있다. 더블클릭하여 사용한다. \n설날 이벤트 기간 후에는 효과를 얻을 수 없다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 윷놀이 게임을 끝내고 받은 선물상자다. 더블클릭하면 내용물을 확인할 수 있다. \n설날 이벤트 기간 이후에는 내용물을 확인할 수 없다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 거짓말쟁이의 러브레터다. 사랑고백일까, 아니면 짖궂은 장난일까? #c더블클릭#하면 진실을 알 수 있다.\n#c사람의 마음을 가지고 장난치는 것은 절대 금물!

string.name: desc
string.value: 솔로들이 즐겨먹는 블랙데이 자장면. 맛이 일품인 이 자장면을 먹으면 솔로 포인트를 100점 획득 할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 메이플스토리 10주년을 맞이해 제작된 서프라이즈 선물상자다. #c더블클릭#하면 내용물을 확인해 볼 수 있다.\n#c2013년 5월22일까지 사용가능.

string.name: desc
string.value: 메이플 10주년 파티가 열리는 10주년 메이플 파크로 이동할 수 있는 전용 시공석이다. #c10분에 1번씩 사용할 수 있다.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 더블클릭하면 10주년 코인을 획득할 수 있다. 단, 몇 개가 나올지는 알 수 없다. 10주년 이벤트 기간 내인 5월 22일까지만 열어 볼 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 메이플스토리 10주년을 맞이해 제작된 행운의 상자다. #c더블클릭#하면 내용물을 확인해 볼 수 있다.\n#c2013년 5월22일까지 사용가능.

string.name: desc
string.value: 메이플스토리 10주년을 맞아 준비된 기프트 박스다. #c더블클릭#하면 내용물을 확인해 볼 수 있다.\n#c2013년 5월22일까지 사용가능.

string.name: desc
string.value: 메이플 10주년을 기념하여 연금술사가 제작한 변신 물약이다. 사용하면 어떤 몬스터로 변신할지 알 수 없다. 단, 이벤트 기간 내인 5월 22일까지만 사용할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 10주년 비츠 중 한가지를 얻을 수 있는 상자다.!!\n#c더블 클릭하면 내용물을 확인할 수 있다. 5월 22일까지 개봉 가능하다.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 거대 할로윈 나무가 선물한 경험치 1.5 배 쿠폰이다. #c더블클릭#해서 사용하면 #c1시간# 동안 #c경험치 1.5배# 버프가 걸린다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 할로윈 마녀 고양이가 떨어트린 경험치 1.5 배 쿠폰이다. #c더블클릭#해서 사용하면 #c1시간# 동안 #c경험치 1.5배# 버프가 걸린다.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass of cool juice that takes away the fatigue from the training.\nAttack increases by 5 and Moving speed by 30 for 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Any type of disorder can be recovered.

string.name: desc
string.value: Really spicy Hot Kebab. The direction key is applied in reverse direction on ingestion. No overlaps

string.name: desc
string.value: Hanghwa that tastes twice as delicious as any others. Movement speed is increased by two. No overlaps

string.name: desc
string.value: Tteokguk which is completely rotten. The screen turns black on ingestion. No overlaps

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Physical Attack 80, Magic Attack 80 for #c30 minutes#.

string.value:
Let's eat Tteokguk for cheer-up! 
#cDuration 30 minutes
Physical Attack +15
Magic Attack +15#

string.name: desc
string.value: I challenged against Hephaestus to won 13 stars and his blessing! Increases Physical Damage +30, Magic Attack +30 of characters' in the map for #c30 minutes#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Got stronger with Power of New Year! \n#cDuration 30 minutes\nHealth and mana up#

string.name: desc
string.value: You can get one of the pretty monsters in Monster Life from the Monster Incubator. An Incubator item will be sent to the farm inventory on purchase.\n#cThe monsters obtained from the Monster Incubator is not granted with the Potential and combination is not allowed.#

#

string.name: desc
string.value: A special buff got for clearing the party quest 3 times a day. Increases Attack & HP for 30 minutes; the buff effect increases as the user level goes up by 5. However, the effect for Level 100 is the same. \r\n#cAvailable in conjunction with other buffs. Although used, it won't disappear in your inventory and available every 30 minutes on the same day.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A love letter not delivered due to sabotage taken by the solo troops. Looks good for firewood.

string.name: desc
string.value: A must have item for the solo troops!

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A fish egg you never know what creature it will be when it opens. Pressing the exchange in the museum after collecting 10 eggs, you can exchange them with one fish.

string.name: desc
string.value: A weapon piece you never know what it will become when collecting them all. Pressing the exchange in the museum after collecting 10 pieces, you can exchange them with one weapon.

string.name: desc
string.value: Unknown Cookie Crumbs. Pressing the exchange in the museum after collecting 10 pieces, you can exchange them with one cookie.

string.name: desc
string.value: The keepsake left by the legendary Collection King. The collection in this keepsake has everything enough to build the complete museum. You're the one who will become the Museum King! (Double clicked, the museum currently underway will be completed automatically.)

string.name: desc
string.value: A Museum Box given to newbies who have completed 3 museums once a day. On completing one more, you can get the Professional Museum Box.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Museum Box given to professionals who have completed 3 museums twice a day. On completing one more, you can get the Royal Museum Box.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Museum Box given to museum kings who have completed 3 museums three times a day. You're the Museum King

string.name: desc
string.value: Unfavorable-looking couple ring in bare eyes. Like to try but, too small to wear. The ring does not go well with us.

string.name: desc
string.value: A necklace supposed to be delivered to a monster lover. Love does not complete with happy ending.

string.name: desc
string.value: Opening the Romancist King Slime Box, you will get three chances a day! 100% chance gives you high-quality equipment enhancement order.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A very special gift box. You can get a wonderful gift when opening it.

string.name: desc
string.value:
The Special Value Pack for various benefits for 2 weeks (Available till March 20, 2013 11:59)

#c-Benefit List-
Experience Level Bonus
Level 1-29: 50% Bonus
Level 30-200: 20% Bonus 

Teleport worldmap function for 2 weeks
Value Pack Store for 2 weeks
Basic Value Pack Giftbox Everyday#

string.name: desc
string.value: A loudspeaker with news scoop. No one knows what scoop it has. Be careful due to Fishing or false information.

string.name: desc
string.value: The legendary liar, Shepherd Boy has left his belongings. #cDouble-clicking# it, you can get one of the shepherd boy's various items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A buff item the legendary liar learned by Shepherd boy to fight against the greedy wolf. According to the rumor, it increases Attack/HP for #c30 minutes#, but even this could be another lie of the shepherd boy's.

string.name: desc
string.value: The transformation potion created by the legendary liar, Shepherd boy to avoid the wolf. #cDouble-clicking# it, you can change into one of the various monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: The legendary liar, Shepherd Boy's Love Letter. Copying the letter contents and send it to others, you can make 100 million according to the rumor.
